{"id":1251401888,"question_id":3402,"lang":"java","lang_name":"Java","time":"1 month","timestamp":1715053552,"status":11,"status_display":"Wrong Answer","runtime":"N/A","url":"/submissions/detail/1251401888/","is_pending":"Not Pending","title":"Minimum Cost to Equalize Array","memory":"N/A","code":"class Solution {\n    public int minCostToEqualizeArray(int[] nums, int cost1, int cost2) {\n        \n        int M = (int) 1e9+7;\n\n        // 數學推導題 https://www.bilibili.com/video/BV1Nf421U7em/?spm_id_from=333.999.0.0&vd_source=c9ea2869a251a096987b9bd5effa8d78\n\n        int len = nums.length;\n        int min = Integer.MAX_VALUE;\n        int max = Integer.MIN_VALUE;\n        long sum = 0 ;\n        for(int n : nums){\n            min = Math.min(min, n);\n            max = Math.max(max, n);\n            sum += n;\n            sum %= M;\n        }\n\n        long need = max * len - sum;\n        if(cost1*2<=cost2|| len<=2){ // 通通用cost1做就好了\n            return (int) (need * cost1 %M);\n        }\n\n        long ans = Integer.MAX_VALUE;\n        long res =0 ;\n        for(int target=max; target<=max*2+1; target++){\n\n            int d = target - min;\n            if( d <= need - d){\n                res = need/2 * cost2 + (need%2)*cost1; // use all cost2 with 1 (or 0) cost1\n            }else\n                res = (need-d)*cost2 + (d-(need-d))*cost1;\n\n            ans = Math.min(ans, res%M);\n            need += len;\n        }\n\n        return (int) (ans % M);\n\n\n        \n    }\n}","compare_result":"","title_slug":"minimum-cost-to-equalize-array","has_notes":false,"flag_type":1}
